TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Nécessite au moins %d2_InvalidRange [NUM2:case:cases] d'écart avec [NUM1:un autre:une autre:d'autres:d'autres] %s1_Improvement[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread Culture Control to the improvement Tile
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Étend les frontières culturelles à la case sélectionnée
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Weitet Kulturradius auf das ausgebaute Feld aus
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Spread Culture Control to the improvement Tile
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Spread Culture Control to the improvement Tile

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spreads Culture Control for radius of %d1_Range Tiles
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Étend les Frontières Culturelles sur un rayon de %d1_Range Tiles
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Dehne den Kulturradius auf einen Radius von %d1_Range Feldern aus
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Spreads Culture Control for radius of %d1_Range Tiles
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Spreads Culture Control for radius of %d1_Range Tiles

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Fournit un Bonus de Culture de +%d1_CultureControlBonus sur la case
